sentences.sContent: Now there are no gaps, so this is the state of matter, and this was the state of a plasma.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now there are no gaps, so this is the state of matter, and this was the state of a plasma.
sentences.sCn: 现在没有任何间隙，这样这是物质的状态，而以前是一个等离子体状态。

sentences.sContent: Scientists think this plasma represents the state of the whole universe justmoments after it was born in the Big Bang, when the universe was extremely hotand dense.
sentences.sContent_eng: Scientists think this plasma represents the state of the whole universe justmoments after it was born in the Big Bang, when the universe was extremely hotand dense.
sentences.sCn: 科学家认为这种等离子体代表整个宇宙在它出生的大爆炸之后瞬间的状态，那时的宇宙是非常炎热和致密的。

sentences.sContent: It receives only in lymph, it gives the emotion through the blood and the right current, what you call, through the nerve system, and it changes to be the same plasma the skin of the man or your nail.
sentences.sContent_eng: It receives only in lymph, it gives the emotion through the blood and the right current, what you call, through the nerve system, and it changes to be the same plasma the skin of the man or your nail.
sentences.sCn: 它只会在淋巴中接收，而通过血液和合适的电流来给予情感，也就是通过你们所说的神经系统，然后它就变成与你的皮肤或者指甲相同的等离子体。

synos.tran: [等离子]等离子体；血浆；[矿物]深绿玉髓

phrases.pCn: 等离子弧，等离子体电弧；电浆弧
等离子弧焊；等离子电弧焊接
等离子体射流；等离子流
等离子发生器；等离子发电机；等离子体产生器
n. 浆细胞；原生质细胞
电浆炬；等离子体焰炬；等离子体喷枪

words.tran: [临床] 血浆除去法；[临床] 血浆取出法（免疫学用语）

trans.tranOther: the yellowish liquid part of blood that contains the blood cells
